question: 19) Physics – Multiple Choice When Faraday was investigating the conductive properties of gases, he sealed metal electrodes into a glass tube and attached an electrostatic generator. W) The conductivity of the gas in the tube X) The type of gas in the tube Y) The type of metal used for the electrodes Z) The amount of energy given to the electrodes
answer: X) THE TYPE OF GAS IN THE TUBE
